name: tooltip
description: Renders a (tooltip) component on interaction with an element
type: <Props>(node: HTMLElement | SVGElement, tooltipComp: { id: string; Component: typeof import('svelte').SvelteComponent; options: Partial<Options<Props>>; }) => { destroy(): void; }

params.name: node
params.description:
the element that triggers rendering
of a component

params.name: tooltipComp
params.type: { id: string; Component: typeof SvelteComponentDev; options: Partial<Options<Props>>; }
params.description:
the component to render on demand where `id` is a unique id of the rendered
      markup, `Component` is the component class to render, and `options` are
      passed to `Component` on creation
